name: image-js
description: Image processing and manipulation in JavaScript
author: MichaÃ«l Zasso

scripts.build-dist: npm run build-dist-main && npm run build-dist-min
scripts.build-dist-main: browserify src/index.js -o dist/image.js --standalone IJS --exclude canvas --ignore buffer --ignore zlib --ignore fs --global-transform [ babelify ]
scripts.build-doc: documentation build src/index.js --github --output docs --format html --sort-order alpha
scripts.publish-doc: npm run build-doc && git add docs && git commit -m 'doc: rebuild docs' && git push origin master
scripts.build: npm run compile && npm run clean-dist && npm run build-dist
scripts.build-test: browserify test/browser/bootstrap.js -o test/browser/image.js --standalone IJS --exclude canvas --ignore buffer --ignore zlib --ignore fs --debug --global-transform [ babelify --sourceMap ]
scripts.compile: npm run clean-lib && babel src --out-dir lib --ignore __tests__
scripts.test: npm run test-mocha && npm run eslint
scripts.test-cov: istanbul cover _mocha -- --compilers js:babel-register --require should --reporter dot --recursive src/**/__tests__/**/*.js
scripts.test-travis: istanbul cover _mocha --report lcovonly -- --compilers js:babel-register --require should --reporter mocha-better-spec-reporter --recursive src/**/__tests__/**/*.js && npm run eslint
scripts.watch-browser: watchify test/browser/bootstrap.js -o test/browser/image.js --standalone IJS --exclude canvas --ignore buffer --ignore zlib --ignore fs --debug --global-transform [ babelify --sourceMap ]
